sqlMap.update: update eka.mst_kartu_pas set reg_spaj = null, flag_active = 0, tgl_active = null where no_kartu = #value#

UPDATE eka.mst_policy tuj SET (mspo_beg_date, mspo_end_date) = (SELECT msbi_beg_date, msbi_end_date FROM eka.mst_billing WHERE reg_spaj = tuj.reg_spaj AND msbi_tahun_ke = 1 AND msbi_premi_ke = 1) WHERE reg_spaj = rpad(replace(#value#,'.'),11,' ')

UPDATE eka.mst_drek SET flag_proses = 1, flag_update = 1, no_spaj = #reg_spaj#, tgl_proses = SYSDATE, user_proses = #lus_id#, flag_tunggal_gabungan = #tipe# WHERE upper(trim(replace(no_trx, '\'))) = upper(trim(replace(#no_trx#, '\'))) AND jenis = #jenis#

UPDATE eka.mst_drek_det
tahun_ke = #tahunKe# premi_ke = #premiKe# jumlah = #jumlah# update_id = #updateId# update_date = #updateDate# no_pre = #no_pre#
WHERE upper(trim(replace(no_trx, '\'))) = upper(trim(replace(#no_trx#, '\'))) and no_spaj = #noSpaj#
and no_ke = #noKe#
and payment_id = #paymentId#
and jenis = #jenis#

UPDATE eka.mst_drek_det SET flag_active = 0, update_id = #updateId#, update_date = #updateDate# WHERE no_spaj = #noSpaj#
and upper(trim(replace(no_trx, '\'))) = upper(trim(replace(#no_trx#, '\')))
and tahun_ke = #tahunKe#
and premi_ke = #premiKe#
and no_ke = #noKe#
and payment_id = #paymentId#

UPDATE eka.mst_drek SET flag_proses = 1, flag_update = 1, no_spaj = #reg_spaj#, tgl_proses = SYSDATE, user_proses = #lus_id#, flag_tunggal_gabungan = #tipe# WHERE upper(trim(replace(no_trx, '\'))) = upper(trim(replace(#no_trx#, '\'))) and jenis = #jenis#
UPDATE eka.mst_drek SET flag_proses = 0, flag_update = 0, no_spaj = null, tgl_proses = null, user_proses = null WHERE no_trx = #no_trx#
UPDATE eka.mst_prosave_bayar SET mpb_flag_bs = 2 WHERE mpb_bayar_id = #mpb_bayar_id# AND mpb_jenis = #mpb_jenis#
UPDATE eka.mst_drek SET flag_recheck = 1 WHERE no_trx = #no_trx#
UPDATE EKA.MST_DREK SET NO_SPAJ = #reg_spaj#, FLAG_PROSES = 1, FLAG_UPDATE = 1, TGl_PROSES = SYSDATE, USER_PROSES = #lus_id# WHERE no_trx = #no_trx#

UPDATE eka.mst_commission c SET msco_active = 0 WHERE reg_spaj = #spaj# AND (msbi_tahun_ke, msbi_premi_ke) IN ( SELECT a.msbi_tahun_ke tahun, a.msbi_premi_ke premi FROM eka.mst_billing a WHERE a.reg_spaj = c.reg_spaj AND a.msbi_tahun_ke = 1 AND a.msbi_premi_ke = 1 UNION SELECT a.msbi_tahun_ke tahun, a.msbi_premi_ke premi FROM eka.mst_billing a, eka.mst_ulink b WHERE a.reg_spaj = c.reg_spaj AND a.reg_spaj = b.reg_spaj AND a.msbi_tahun_ke = b.mu_tahun_ke AND a.msbi_premi_ke = b.mu_premi_ke AND a.msbi_beg_date = (SELECT msbi_beg_date FROM eka.mst_billing WHERE reg_spaj = a.reg_spaj AND msbi_tahun_ke = 1 AND msbi_premi_ke = 1) UNION SELECT msl_tahun_ke tahun, msl_premi_ke premi FROM eka.mst_slink WHERE reg_spaj = c.reg_spaj AND msl_new = 1)
UPDATE eka.mst_commission SET msco_active = 1 WHERE reg_spaj = #spaj# AND msbi_tahun_ke = #msbi_tahun_ke# AND msbi_premi_ke = #msbi_premi_ke#

UPDATE eka.mst_commission c SET msco_active = 1 WHERE reg_spaj = #spaj# AND (msbi_tahun_ke, msbi_premi_ke) IN ( SELECT a.msbi_tahun_ke tahun, a.msbi_premi_ke premi FROM eka.mst_billing a WHERE a.reg_spaj = c.reg_spaj AND a.msbi_tahun_ke = 1 AND a.msbi_premi_ke = 1 UNION SELECT a.msbi_tahun_ke tahun, a.msbi_premi_ke premi FROM eka.mst_billing a, eka.mst_ulink b WHERE a.reg_spaj = c.reg_spaj AND a.reg_spaj = b.reg_spaj AND a.msbi_tahun_ke = b.mu_tahun_ke AND a.msbi_premi_ke = b.mu_premi_ke AND a.msbi_beg_date = (SELECT msbi_beg_date FROM eka.mst_billing WHERE reg_spaj = a.reg_spaj AND msbi_tahun_ke = 1 AND msbi_premi_ke = 1) UNION SELECT msl_tahun_ke tahun, msl_premi_ke premi FROM eka.mst_slink WHERE reg_spaj = c.reg_spaj AND msl_new = 1)

UPDATE eka.mst_pbp
flag_cair = #flag_cair# flag_transfer = #flag_transfer# premi_ke = #premi_ke# reg_spaj = upper(#reg_spaj#) spaj_bayar = upper(#spaj_bayar#) tgl_jttempo = #tgl_jttempo#
WHERE REG_SPAJ = #reg_spaj# AND SPAJ_BAYAR = #spaj_bayar#

UPDATE eka.mst_powersave_ubah
lus_id = #lus_id# mpu_akhir = #mpu_akhir# mpu_awal = #mpu_awal# mpu_confirm_date = #mpu_confirm_date# mpu_deposit = #mpu_deposit# mpu_input = #mpu_input# mpu_interest = #mpu_interest# mpu_jenis = #mpu_jenis# mpu_mature_date = #mpu_mature_date# mpu_no_reg = upper(#mpu_no_reg#) mpu_note = upper(#mpu_note#) mpu_print = #mpu_print# mpu_print_date = #mpu_print_date# mpu_print_reg = #mpu_print_reg# mpu_tgl_awal = #mpu_tgl_awal# reg_spaj = upper(#reg_spaj#)
WHERE REG_SPAJ = #reg_spaj# AND MPU_JENIS = #mpu_jenis# AND MPU_TGL_AWAL = #mpu_tgl_awal#
UPDATE eka.mst_slink SET msl_paid_date = trunc(sysdate) WHERE reg_spaj = rpad(replace(#value#,'.'),11,' ') AND msl_new = 1
UPDATE eka.mst_policy SET mspo_oldpol_eb = #old_polis# WHERE reg_spaj = #reg_spaj#
UPDATE eka.mst_insured SET $kolom$ = #sysdate# WHERE reg_spaj in #daftar[]#
UPDATE eka.mst_insured SET $kolom$ = #sysdate# WHERE reg_spaj = rpad(replace(#reg_spaj#,'.'),11,' ')

update eka.mst_production set upp_eva = #upp_eva#, upp_kontes=#upp_kontes#, upp_lain=#upp_lain#, upp_bonus=#upp_bonus# where lstb_id = #lstb_id# and reg_spaj = #reg_spaj# and mspro_prod_ke = #mspro_prod_ke#
update eka.mst_production set com_eva = #com_eva# where lstb_id = 1 and reg_spaj = #reg_spaj# and mspro_prod_ke = #mspro_prod_ke#
UPDATE eka.mst_stamp SET mstm_saldo_akhir = mstm_saldo_akhir - #msth_jumlah# WHERE mstm_kode = #mstm_kode#
update eka.mst_insured set mste_tgl_kirim_polis = sysdate where reg_spaj = rpad(replace(#value#,'.'),11,' ')
update eka.mst_insured set mste_flag_upload_scan=#flag# where reg_spaj = rpad(replace(#spaj#,'.'),11,' ')
update eka.mst_policy set flag_email=#flag# where reg_spaj = rpad(replace(#spaj#,'.'),11,' ')
update eka.mst_insured set mste_tgl_valid_print = sysdate where reg_spaj = rpad(replace(#value#,'.'),11,' ')
update eka.mst_policy set mspo_plan_provider = #kode# where reg_spaj = rpad(replace(#spaj#,'.'),11,' ')
update eka.mst_policy set MSPO_SELF_INS = #mspo_self_ins# where reg_spaj = rpad(replace(#reg_spaj#,'.'),11,' ')
update eka.mst_policy set mspo_no_kerjasama = #tm_id#, mspo_spv_dmtm = #spv_code# where reg_spaj = rpad(replace(#spaj#,'.'),11,' ')
update eka.mst_policy set mspo_spv_dmtm = #spv_code# where reg_spaj = rpad(replace(#spaj#,'.'),11,' ')

UPDATE eka.mst_csf_dial
flag_inout = #inout# mscsf_beg_tgl_dial = decode(#s_start#,null,sysdate,'',sysdate,to_date(to_char(sysdate,'yyyymmdd')||' '||#s_start#,'yyyymmdd hh24:mi:ss')) mscsf_end_tgl_dial = decode(#s_end#,null,sysdate,'',sysdate,to_date(to_char(sysdate,'yyyymmdd')||' '||#s_end#,'yyyymmdd hh24:mi:ss')) mscsf_tgl_back = to_date(#s_callback#,'dd/mm/yyyy') mscsf_ket = #s_ket# lus_id = #lus_id#
WHERE REG_SPAJ = rpad(replace(#spaj#,'.'),11,' ') AND MSCSF_DIAL_KE = #s_dial# AND LUS_ID = #lus_id#
update eka.mst_trans_ulink set mtu_unit = 0, mtu_saldo_unit = 0, lspd_id = #lspd_id# where reg_spaj = #reg_spaj# and lt_id != 13
update eka.mst_det_ulink set mdu_saldo_unit = 0 where reg_spaj = #reg_spaj# and mu_ke not in (select mu_ke from eka.mst_ulink where lt_id = 13)

UPDATE eka.mst_trans_ulink
mtu_jumlah = #MTU_JUMLAH# mtu_unit = #MTU_UNIT# mtu_saldo_unit = #MTU_SALDO_UNIT# lspd_id = #LSPD_ID# mtu_tgl_nab = #MTU_TGL_NAB# mtu_nab = #MTU_NAB# mtu_tgl_proses = $MTU_TGL_PROSES$
WHERE REG_SPAJ = #REG_SPAJ# AND MU_KE = #MU_KE# AND MTU_KE = #MTU_KE#
UPDATE eka.mst_trans_ulink set lspd_id = #lspd# WHERE REG_SPAJ = #spaj# AND MU_KE = #muke#

UPDATE eka.mst_det_ulink SET mdu_saldo_unit = #ld_saldo#, mdu_saldo_unit_pp = #ld_saldo_pp#, mdu_saldo_unit_tu = #ld_saldo_tu# WHERE reg_spaj = rpad(replace(#spaj#,'.'),11,' ') AND mu_ke IN (1, #li_ke#) AND lji_id = #jenis_invest#
UPDATE eka.mst_ulink SET mu_lspd_id = #li_pos# WHERE (reg_spaj = rpad(replace(#spaj#,'.'),11,' ')) AND (mu_ke = #li_ke#)
UPDATE eka.mst_ulink SET mu_flag_print = #flag# WHERE reg_spaj = RPAD (replace(#spaj#,'.'), 11, ' ') AND mu_ke = #muke#
UPDATE eka.mst_trans_ulink SET mtu_flag_print = #flag# WHERE reg_spaj = RPAD (replace(#spaj#,'.'), 11, ' ') AND mu_ke = #muke#

UPDATE eka.mst_rek_client set tgl_change = sysdate, lus_id = #lus_id#
lsbp_id = #lsbp_id# mrc_cabang = upper(#mrc_cabang#) mrc_jenis = #mrc_jenis# mrc_jn_nasabah = #mrc_jn_nasabah# mrc_kota = upper(#mrc_kota#) mrc_kurs = upper(#mrc_kurs#) mrc_nama = upper(#mrc_nama#) mrc_no_ac = upper(#mrc_no_ac#) mrc_kuasa = #mrc_kuasa# tgl_surat = #tgl_surat# lsbp_va = #lsbp_va#
WHERE REG_SPAJ = rpad(replace(#reg_spaj#,'.'),11,' ')

UPDATE eka.mst_address_billing
e_mail = upper(#e_mail#) flag_cc = #flag_cc# kota = upper(#kota_tgh#) lca_id = upper(#lca_id#) lska_id = #lska_id# lskc_id = #lskc_id# lskl_id = #lskl_id# lsrg_id = upper(#lsrg_id#) lti_id = #lti_id# lwk_id = upper(#lwk_id#) msap_address = upper(#msap_address#) msap_area_code1 = upper(#msap_area_code1#) msap_area_code2 = upper(#msap_area_code2#) msap_area_code3 = upper(#msap_area_code3#) msap_area_code_fax1 = upper(#msap_area_code_fax1#) msap_area_code_fax2 = upper(#msap_area_code_fax2#) msap_contact = upper(#msap_contact#) msap_fax1 = upper(#msap_fax1#) msap_fax2 = upper(#msap_fax2#) msap_phone1 = upper(#msap_phone1#) msap_phone2 = upper(#msap_phone2#) msap_phone3 = upper(#msap_phone3#) msap_zip_code = upper(#msap_zip_code#) no_hp = upper(#no_hp#) no_hp2 = upper(#no_hp2#) lsne_id = #lsne_id#
WHERE reg_spaj = RPAD (replace(#reg_spaj#,'.'), 11, ' ')

UPDATE eka.mst_billing tuj SET lspd_id = decode(lspd_id, 99, lspd_id, #lspd#) WHERE reg_spaj = RPAD (REPLACE (#spaj#, '.'), 11, ' ') AND msbi_tahun_ke = 1 AND msbi_paid = 1 AND msbi_beg_date = (SELECT msbi_beg_date FROM eka.mst_billing WHERE reg_spaj = tuj.reg_spaj AND msbi_tahun_ke = 1 AND msbi_premi_ke = 1)

UPDATE eka.mst_billing tuj SET lspd_id = DECODE (lspd_id, 99, lspd_id, #lspd#) WHERE reg_spaj = RPAD (REPLACE (#spaj#, '.'), 11, ' ') AND msbi_paid = 1 AND (reg_spaj, msbi_tahun_ke, msbi_premi_ke) IN ( SELECT reg_spaj, msl_tahun_ke, msl_premi_ke FROM eka.mst_slink WHERE reg_spaj = tuj.reg_spaj AND msl_new = 1)

UPDATE eka.mst_billing SET msbi_flag_sisa = #flag_sisa#
msbi_paid = #flag_bayar# msbi_remain = #sisa# lspd_id=#lspd_id# msbi_paid_date=#msbi_paid_date# msbi_persen_paid=#msbi_persen_paid#
WHERE reg_spaj = rpad(replace(#spaj#,'.'),11,' ') AND msbi_tahun_ke = #tahun# AND msbi_premi_ke = #premi#
UPDATE eka.mst_billing SET lspd_id = #lspd_id# WHERE reg_spaj = rpad(replace(#spaj#,'.'),11,' ')

update eka.mst_tag_payment set mstp_value = #topup.mspa_payment# where reg_spaj=replace(#topup.reg_spaj#,'.') and msbi_tahun_ke = #tahun# and msbi_premi_ke = #premi# and mspa_payment_id = #topup.mspa_payment_id#

update eka.mst_payment set lku_id = #lku_id#, lsjb_id = #lsjb_id#, client_bank = #client_bank#, mspa_no_rek = #mspa_no_rek#, mspa_pay_date = #pay_date#, mspa_due_date = #mspa_due_date:DATE#, mspa_date_book = #mspa_date_book#, mspa_payment = #mspa_payment#, mspa_input_date = sysdate, mspa_desc = #mspa_desc#, lus_id = #lus_id#, lsrek_id = nvl(#lsrek_id#,0) , mspa_nilai_kurs = #mspa_nilai_kurs#, mspa_old_policy = (case when #lsjb_id#>=10 then replace(#mspa_old_policy:VARCHAR#,'.') else null end), mspa_no_pre = #no_pre#, mspa_flag_merchant = #mspa_flag_merchant# where mspa_payment_id = #mspa_payment_id# and reg_spaj = rpad(replace(#reg_spaj#,'.'),11,' ')
UPDATE eka.mst_payment SET mspa_jurnal = 1, mspa_no_voucher = #voucher#, mspa_no_pre = #ls_pre#, mspa_no_jm = #no_jm#, mspa_no_jm_sa = #no_jm_sa# WHERE mspa_payment_id = #mspa_payment_id#

UPDATE eka.mst_payment SET mspa_jurnal = 1, mspa_no_voucher = #voucher#, mspa_no_pre = #ls_pre#, mspa_no_jm = #no_jm#, mspa_no_jm_sa = #no_jm_sa# WHERE reg_spaj = #no_spaj# AND msdp_number = #msdp_number#
UPDATE eka.mst_reins SET lspd_id = 100, msre_lapse_date = SYSDATE, msre_print_certificate = 0 WHERE reg_spaj = rpad(replace(#value#,'.'),11,' ')
update eka.mst_ulink set mu_aktif = 0, mu_lspd_id = #lspd_id# where reg_spaj = rpad(replace(#spaj#,'.'),11,' ')

UPDATE eka.mst_policy
lspd_id = #lspd# mspo_proses_bill = #proses# mspo_date_ttp = #ttp#
WHERE reg_spaj = RPAD (replace(#spaj#,'.'), 11, ' ')
UPDATE eka.mst_agent SET msag_prod_1 = #prodDate# WHERE msag_id = (select msag_id from eka.mst_agent_prod where lsle_id='4' and reg_spaj = rpad(replace(#spaj#,'.'),11,' '))

UPDATE eka.mst_billing SET lspd_id = 6, msbi_paid_date = (SELECT MAX (b.mspa_date_book) FROM eka.mst_tag_payment a, eka.mst_payment b WHERE b.mspa_payment_id = a.mspa_payment_id AND a.reg_spaj = RPAD (replace(#value#,'.'), 11, ' ') AND a.msbi_tahun_ke = 1 AND a.msbi_premi_ke = 2) WHERE reg_spaj = RPAD (replace(#value#,'.'), 11, ' ') AND msbi_tahun_ke = 1 AND msbi_premi_ke = 2
UPDATE eka.mst_insured SET lspd_id = #posisi# WHERE reg_spaj = rpad(replace(#spaj#,'.'),11,' ') AND mste_insured_no = 1
UPDATE eka.mst_policy SET lspd_id = #posisi#, mspo_date_ttp=#mspo_date_ttp# WHERE reg_spaj = rpad(replace(#spaj#,'.'),11,' ')
UPDATE eka.mst_policy SET $kolom$ = sysdate WHERE reg_spaj = RPAD (replace(#spaj#,'.'), 11, ' ')
UPDATE eka.mst_policy SET mspo_date_print = null WHERE reg_spaj = RPAD (replace(#spaj#,'.'), 11, ' ')
UPDATE eka.mst_ulink SET mu_flag_print = #flagPrint# WHERE reg_spaj = RPAD (replace(#spaj#,'.'), 11, ' ') AND to_char(mu_tgl_trans,'yyyymmdd') = #tglTrans#
UPDATE eka.mst_trans_ulink SET mtu_flag_print = #flagPrint# WHERE reg_spaj = RPAD (replace(#spaj#,'.'), 11, ' ') AND to_char(mtu_tgl_trans,'yyyymmdd') = #tglTrans#
UPDATE eka.mst_ulink SET mu_lspd_id = 49 WHERE reg_spaj = RPAD (replace(#spaj#,'.'), 11, ' ') AND mu_ke IN (1, #ke#)
UPDATE eka.mst_trans_ulink SET lspd_id = 49 WHERE reg_spaj = RPAD (replace(#spaj#,'.'), 11, ' ') AND mu_ke IN (1, #ke#)
UPDATE eka.mst_policy SET lspd_id = #lspd# WHERE reg_spaj = RPAD (replace(#spaj#,'.'), 11, ' ')

UPDATE EKA.MST_POWERSAVE_PROSES SET MPS_JANGKA_INV = #ii_jamin#, MPS_ROLL_OVER = #li_auto#, MPS_RATE_DATE = #ldt_ps_int#, MPS_RATE = #ldec_bunga#, MPS_DEPOSIT_DATE = #idt_begin#, MPS_BATAS_DATE = #ldt_next#, MPS_PRM_DEPOSIT = #ldec_inv#, MPS_PRM_INTEREST = #ldec_intrs#, MPS_EMPLOYEE = #li_employ#, MPS_INPUT_DATE = SYSDATE, LUS_ID = #gl_lus_id# WHERE ( EKA.MST_POWERSAVE_PROSES.REG_SPAJ = RPAD (replace(#spaj#,'.'), 11, ' ') ) AND ( EKA.MST_POWERSAVE_PROSES.MPS_KODE = #mps_kode# )

UPDATE EKA.MST_REK_CLIENT SET EKA.MST_REK_CLIENT.MRC_CABANG=#mrc_cabang#, EKA.MST_REK_CLIENT.MRC_NAMA=#mrc_nama#, EKA.MST_REK_CLIENT.MRC_NO_AC=#mrc_no_ac#, EKA.MST_REK_CLIENT.LSBP_ID=#lsbp_id#, EKA.MST_REK_CLIENT.MRC_JENIS=#mrc_jenis# WHERE EKA.MST_REK_CLIENT.REG_SPAJ =rpad(replace(#reg_spaj#,'.'),11,' ')
UPDATE EKA.MST_REINS SET LSPD_ID = #lspd_id#, MSRE_LAPSE_DATE = SYSDATE, MSRE_PRINT_CERTIFICATE = #kd_print# WHERE EKA.MST_REINS.REG_SPAJ = rpad(replace(#reg_spaj#,'.'),11,' ')
UPDATE EKA.MST_POLICY SET LSSP_ID = #lssp_id#, LSPD_ID = #lspd_id#, MSPO_PROSES_BILL = #kd_bill# WHERE EKA.MST_POLICY.REG_SPAJ = rpad(replace(#reg_spaj#,'.'),11,' ')
UPDATE EKA.MST_SAMPLE_UW SET STATUS_BATAL = #kode# WHERE EKA.MST_SAMPLE_UW.REG_SPAJ = rpad(replace(#spaj#,'.'),11,' ')

UPDATE EKA.MST_PRODUCT_INSURED SET LSBS_ID = #bisnisId#, LSDBS_NUMBER = #bisnisNumber#, LKU_ID = #kursId#, MSPR_BEG_DATE = #begDate#, MSPR_END_DATE = #endDate#, MSPR_TSI = #msprTsi#, MSPR_TSI_PA_A = #msprTsiA#, MSPR_TSI_PA_B = #msprTsiB#, MSPR_TSI_PA_C = #msprTsiC#, MSPR_TSI_PA_D = #msprTsiD#, MSPR_TSI_PA_M = #msprTsiM#, MSPR_CLASS = #msprClass#, MSPR_UNIT = #msprUnit#, MSPR_RATE = #msprRate#, MSPR_PERSEN = #msprPersen#, MSPR_PREMIUM = #msprPremium#, MSPR_DISCOUNT = #msprDiscount#, MSPR_EXTRA = #msprExtra#, MSPR_INS_PERIOD = #msprInsPeriod#, MSPR_END_PAY = #msprEndPay#, MSPR_TT = #msprTt# WHERE ( EKA.MST_PRODUCT_INSURED.REG_SPAJ = rpad(#noSpaj#,11,' ') ) AND ( EKA.MST_PRODUCT_INSURED.MSTE_INSURED_NO = #insuredNo# ) AND ( EKA.MST_PRODUCT_INSURED.MSPR_ACTIVE = #msprActive# ) AND ( EKA.MST_PRODUCT_INSURED.LSBS_ID = #bisnisIdOld# )
UPDATE EKA.MST_POLICY SET EKA.MST_POLICY.LSPD_ID = #lspd# WHERE EKA.MST_POLICY.REG_SPAJ = rpad(replace(#spaj#,'.'),11,' ')
UPDATE EKA.MST_INSURED SET EKA.MST_INSURED.LSPD_ID = #lspd# WHERE EKA.MST_INSURED.REG_SPAJ = rpad(replace(#spaj#,'.'),11,' ')
UPDATE EKA.MST_INSURED SET EKA.MST_INSURED.LSPD_ID = #lspd#, EKA.MST_INSURED.LSSA_ID = #lssa# WHERE EKA.MST_INSURED.REG_SPAJ = rpad(replace(#spaj#,'.'),11,' ')

UPDATE EKA.MST_DET_MEDICAL SET LSMC_ID = #lsmc_id#, MSDM_STATUS = #msdm_status#, MSDM_DESC = #msdm_desc# WHERE REG_SPAJ= rpad(replace(#reg_spaj#,'.'),11,' ') AND MSTE_INSURED_NO=#mste_insured_no# AND LSMC_ID=#lsmc_id_old# and MPA_NUMBER = #mpa_number#

UPDATE EKA.M_REAS_TEMP SET MSTE_REAS = #mste_reas# WHERE EKA.M_REAS_TEMP.REG_SPAJ = #spaj#
update eka.mst_insured set mste_standard=#mste_standard# where eka.mst_insured.reg_spaj=#spaj# and eka.mst_insured.mste_insured_no=#insured#
update eka.mst_policy set lssp_id = #lsspId# where eka.mst_policy.reg_spaj = #spaj#
update eka.mst_position_spaj set msps_desc=#desc# where reg_spaj=#spaj# and lssa_id=#lssaId# and msps_date= to_date(#mspsDate#,'dd-MM-yyyy hh24:mi:ss')
update eka.mst_policy set mspo_no_blanko = #noBlangko# where eka.mst_policy.reg_spaj = #spaj#

update eka.mst_client_new set $nama_kolom$= #nilai# where eka.mst_client_new.mcl_id = #mcl_id#
update eka.mst_policy set lsre_id = #lsre_id# where eka.mst_policy.reg_spaj = #reg_spaj#
